bill_title: establish a bid process for the haying of certain interstate and highway medians.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to establish a bid process for the haying of certain interstate and highway medians. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That the code be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: The Department of Transportation shall establish a bid process for the mowing and haying of the medians on the state trunk highway system. The mowing and haying of a median may only be done under a contract with the department. The department shall announce in at least three newspapers when the department will accept bid proposals for mowing, processing, and removing hay from a median within twenty-four hours. The department shall request bids for specific sections of highway. Any area for which the bidder is an abutting landowner shall be identified separately from other areas on which the bidder wishes to bid. Each bid shall be submitted on a per mile basis for each area being let for bid. A bidder shall provide proof of liability insurance and must utilize the proper safety equipment warning highway users. Any winning bidders must work with the department for safe hay removal and traffic control. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.167 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
